mapper.insert: insert into tbl_inquiry (inquiry_id, user_id, storage_id, inquiry_title, inquiry_content, inquiry_regist, inquiry_answer) values (#{inquiryId}, #{userId}, #{storageId}, #{inquiryTitle}, #{inquiryContent}, current_timestamp(), #{inquiryAnswer})
mapper.select: select inquiry_id, user_id, storage_id, inquiry_title, inquiry_content, inquiry_regist from tbl_inquiry where inquiry_id = ${inquiryId}
